newsitem.title: CHINA: China opens biggest refrigerated container base.
newsitem.headline: China opens biggest refrigerated container base.

text.p: China's biggest production base of refrigerated containers opened in the Baoshan area of Shanghai, the Business News reported on Monday.
The Shanghai Zhongji Freezer Container Co began production on Sunday, using world-class production facilities and equipment that can produce a refrigerated container every 16 minutes, it said.
Work on the plant, involving an investment of $50 million, began on August 5, 1995, it said.
The company will produce, sell and repair freezer container and spare parts and provide technical advice and service, the newspaper said but gave no more details.
